docs.title: Home
docs.text:
Welcome to the wiki page for the srsc project.

The rule-set convertor for sing-box.

docs.title: Support
docs.text: Channel Link GitHub Issues https://github.com/SagerNet/srsc/issues Email contact@sagernet.org

docs.title: Introduction
docs.text: srsc uses JSON for configuration files.

docs.title: Structure
docs.text:
{
  "log": {},
  "listen": "",
  "listen_port": 0,
  "endpoints": {},
  "tls": {},
  "cache": {},
  "resources": {}
}

docs.title: log
docs.text: Log configuration, see Log.

docs.title: listen
docs.text:
Required

Listen address.

docs.title: listen_port
docs.text:
Required

Listen port.

docs.title: endpoints
docs.text: HTTP endpoint configuration, see Endpoint.

docs.title: tls
docs.text: TLS configuration, see TLS.

docs.title: cache
docs.text: Cache configuration, see Cache.

docs.title: resources
docs.text: Resource configuration, see Resources.

docs.title: Check
docs.text: srsc check

docs.title: Format
docs.text: srsc format -w -c config.json -D config_directory

docs.title: Structure
docs.text:
MemoryRedis 
{
  "type": "",
  "expiration": ""
}

{
  "type": "redis",
  "address": [],
  "username": "",
  "password": "",
  "db": 0,
  "protocol": 0,
  "pool_size": 0,
  "tls": {},
  "expiration": ""
}

docs.title: type
docs.text: Type Description memory (default) Use memory cache. redis Use Redis cache.

docs.title: expiration
docs.text:
Cache expiration time, in Go duration format (e.g., 5m, 1h, 24h).

Never expire if not set.

docs.title: address
docs.text: Either a single address or a seed list of host:port addresses of cluster/sentinel nodes.

docs.title: username
docs.text: Username is used to authenticate the current connection with one of the connections defined in the ACL list when connecting to a Redis 6.0 instance, or greater, that is using the Redis ACL system.

docs.title: password
docs.text: Password is an optional password. Must match the password specified in the requirepass server configuration option (if connecting to a Redis 5.0 instance, or lower), or the User Password when connecting to a Redis 6.0 instance, or greater, that is using the Redis ACL system.

docs.title: db
docs.text: DB is the database to be selected after connecting to the server.

docs.title: protocol
docs.text:
Protocol 2 or 3. Use the version to negotiate RESP version with redis-server.

3 will be used by default.

docs.title: pool_size
docs.text:
PoolSize is the base number of socket connections.

10 connections per every available CPU as reported by runtime.GOMAXPROCS will be used by default.

docs.title: tls
docs.text: TLS configuration, see TLS.

docs.title: Structure
Resource Structure
docs.text:
{
  ... // Source Fetch Fields
  ... // Source Convert Fields
}

docs.title: geoip
docs.text:
GEOIP resource.

If configured, all converted GEOIP rule items will be replaced by the configured resource item during conversion.

docs.title: geosite
docs.text:
GEOSITE resource.

If configured, all converted GEOSITE rule items will be replaced by the configured resource item during conversion.

docs.title: ipasn
docs.text:
IPASN resource.

If configured, all converted IPASN rule items will be replaced by the configured resource item during conversion.

docs.title: Source Fetch Fields
docs.text:
See Source Fetch Fields.

The corresponding resource key will be filled in the path or URL template.

Resource Key Description GEOIP .code The GEOIP code GEOIP .code The GEOSITE code IPASN .asn The Autonomous System Number (ASN)

docs.title: Source Convert Fields
docs.text: See Source Convert Fields.

docs.title: Convertor
docs.text: Convertor Format source Source binary Binary adguard AdGuard clash Clash

docs.title: Source Structure
docs.text:
{
  "source_type": "",

  ... // Type Specific Fields
}

docs.title: Target Structure
docs.text:
{
  "target_type": "",

  ... // Type Specific Fields
}

docs.title: source_type
docs.text:
Required

The type of the source convertor.

docs.title: target_type
docs.text:
Required

The type of the target convertor.

docs.title: AdGuard
docs.text:
AdGuard DNS Filer.

Special rule-set supported by sing-box, covering most of the syntax supported by AdGuard Home.

Since it contains many other rules that cannot be represented in any other format, it can only be converted to and from bianry.

docs.title: Source Structure
docs.text:
{
  "source_type": "adguard",
  "accept_extended_rules": false
}

docs.title: Target Structure
docs.text:
{
  "target_type": "adguard"
}

docs.title: accept_extended_rules
docs.text:
If not enabled, only rule items that can be expressed by domain, domain_suffix, domain_regex will be parsed, and other items will be ignored.

Otherwise, most rules supported by AdGuard DNS Filter will be supported, but can only be converted to and from sing-box rule-set binary.

For compatibility, see AdGuard DNS Filter.

docs.title: Binary
docs.text: sing-box rule-set binary.

docs.title: Source Structure
docs.text:
{
  "source_type": "binary"
}

docs.title: Target Structure
docs.text:
{
  "target_type": "binary"
}

docs.title: Clash
docs.text: Clash rule provider.

docs.title: Source Structure
docs.text:
{
  "source_type": "clash",
  "source_format": "",
  "source_behavior": ""
}

docs.title: Target Structure
docs.text:
{
  "target_type": "clash",
  "target_format": "",
  "target_behavior": ""
}

docs.title: source_format
docs.text:
Required

The format of the input provider, available values are: text, yaml, mrs.

docs.title: source_behavior
docs.text:
Required

The format of the input provider, available values are: domain, ipcidr, classical.

docs.title: target_format
docs.text:
Required

The format of the output provider, available values are: text, yaml, mrs.

docs.title: target_behavior
docs.text:
Required

The behavior of the output provider, available values are: domain, ipcidr, classical.

docs.title: Source
docs.text: sing-box rule-set source.

docs.title: Source Structure
docs.text:
{
  "source_type": "source"
}

docs.title: Target Structure
docs.text:
{
  "target_type": "target"
}

docs.title: Structure
docs.text:
{
  "endpoints": {
    "<endpoint_path>": {
      "type": ""
    }
  }
}

docs.title: endpoint_path
docs.text:
Required

Endpoint path of the HTTP server.

docs.title: type
docs.text:
Required

Type Format file File

docs.title: File
docs.text: The File endpoint converts rule-sets from local or remote files.

docs.title: Structure
source
docs.text:
Required

Source of rule-sets, local or remote.

docs.title: path
docs.text:
Required

Path to the file to be converted.

Templates in the endpoint path can be used in the path, for example:

{
  ...,

  "endpoints": {
    ...,

    "/{name}.srs": {
      "type": "file",
      "source": "local",
      "path": "/path/to/{{ name }}.json",

      ...
    }
  }
}

docs.title: url
docs.text:
Required

URL of the remote file to be converted.

Templates in the endpoint path can be used in the URL, for example:

{
  ...,

  "endpoints": {
    ...,

    "/{name}.srs": {
      "type": "file",
      "source": "remote",
      "url": "https://example.com/{{ name }}.json",

      ...
    }
  }
}

docs.title: user_agent
docs.text:
Custom User-Agent in HTTP requests.

srsc/$version (sing-box $sing-box-version) is used by default.

docs.title: ttl
docs.text:
Minimum time interval to check for updates.

5m is used by default.

docs.title: tls
docs.text: Custom TLS configuration, see TLS.

docs.title: Dial Fields
docs.text:
Custom dialer options, see Dial Fields.

Only basic options are supported, features like detour, DNS, multi-network dialing, etc. that rely on sing-box are not available.

docs.title: source_type
docs.text:
Required

See Convertors for more details.

docs.title: Requirements
docs.text:
• Go 1.23.x

You can download and install Go from: https://go.dev/doc/install, latest version is recommended.

docs.title: Build
docs.text:
make

Or build and install binary to $GOBIN:

make install

docs.title: Command
docs.text:
docker run -d \
  -v /etc/srsc:/etc/srsc/ \
  --name=srsc \
  --restart=always \
  ghcr.io/sagernet/srsc \
  -D /var/lib/srsc \
  -C /etc/srsc/ run

docs.title: Compose
docs.text:
services:
  srsc:
    image: ghcr.io/sagernet/srsc
    container_name: srsc
    restart: always
    volumes:
      - /etc/srsc:/etc/srsc/
    command: -D /var/lib/srsc -C /etc/srsc/ run

docs.title: Repository Installation
Manual Installation
docs.text:
The script download and install the latest package from GitHub releases for deb or rpm based Linux distributions, ArchLinux and OpenWrt.

curl -fsSL https://sing-box.app/srsc/install.sh | sh

or latest beta:

curl -fsSL https://sing-box.app/srsc/install.sh | sh -s -- --beta

or specific version:

curl -fsSL https://sing-box.app/srsc/install.sh | sh -s -- --version <version>
```

docs.title: Service Management
docs.text:
For Linux systems with systemd, usually the installation already includes a srsc service, you can manage the service using the following command:

Operation Command Enable sudo systemctl enable srsc Disable sudo systemctl disable srsc Start sudo systemctl start srsc Stop sudo systemctl stop srsc Kill sudo systemctl kill srsc Restart sudo systemctl restart srsc Logs sudo journalctl -u srsc --output cat -e New Logs sudo journalctl -u srsc --output cat -f

docs.title: 开始
docs.text:
欢迎来到该 srsc 项目的文档页。

sing-box 规则集转换器。

docs.title: 支持
docs.text: 通道 链接 GitHub Issues https://github.com/SagerNet/srsc/issues 邮件 contact@sagernet.org

docs.title: 要求
docs.text:
• Go 1.23.x

您可以从 https://go.dev/doc/install 下载并安装 Go，推荐使用最新版本。

docs.title: 构建
docs.text:
make

或者构建二进制文件并将其安装到 $GOBIN：

make install

docs.title: 命令
docs.text:
docker run -d \
  -v /etc/srsc:/etc/srsc/ \
  --name=srsc \
  --restart=always \
  ghcr.io/sagernet/srsc \
  -D /var/lib/srsc \
  -C /etc/srsc/ run

docs.title: 仓库安装
手动安装
docs.text:
该脚本从 GitHub 发布中下载并安装最新的软件包，适用于基于 deb 或 rpm 的 Linux 发行版、ArchLinux 和 OpenWrt。

curl -fsSL https://sing-box.app/srsc/install.sh | sh

或最新测试版：

curl -fsSL https://sing-box.app/srsc/install.sh | sh -s -- --beta

或指定版本：

curl -fsSL https://sing-box.app/srsc/install.sh | sh -s -- --version <version>

docs.title: 服务管理
docs.text:
对于带有 systemd 的 Linux 系统，通常安装已经包含 serenity 服务， 您可以使用以下命令管理服务：

行动 命令 启用 sudo systemctl enable serenity 禁用 sudo systemctl disable serenity 启动 sudo systemctl start serenity 停止 sudo systemctl stop serenity 强行停止 sudo systemctl kill serenity 重新启动 sudo systemctl restart serenity 查看日志 sudo journalctl -u serenity --output cat -e 实时日志 sudo journalctl -u serenity --output cat -f
